mapper.select: SELECT a.TaskID AS "TaskID", p.FormInstID AS "FormInstID", NVL(s.FilePath, '') AS "FilePath", NVL(jf2.FormPrefix, '') AS "FormPrefix" FROM jwf_process p INNER JOIN jwf_workitem a ON p.processid = a.processid INNER JOIN jwf_performer b ON (a.workitemid = b.workitemid AND b.subkind = 'T000') INNER JOIN sys_object_user_approval c ON b.UserCode = c.UserCode INNER JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup d ON b.UserCode = d.UserCode AND d.JobType='Origin' INNER JOIN jwf_forminstance jf ON p.FormInstID = jf.FormInstID INNER JOIN jwf_forms jf2 ON jf.FormID = jf2.FormID LEFT OUTER JOIN jwf_signimage s ON (b.usercode = s.usercode AND s.IsUse = 'Y') WHERE p.ProcessState = '288' AND a.State = '288' AND LNNVL(a.BusinessData4 != 'FAIL') AND c.UseDeputy = 'Y' AND c.DeputyOption = 'P' AND (#{CompanyCode} = 'ORGROOT' OR d.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode}) AND a.Created BETWEEN DeputyFromDate AND (TO_DATE(DeputyToDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) AND SYSDATE BETWEEN DeputyFromDate AND (TO_DATE(DeputyToDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1)

SELECT a.TaskID AS "TaskID" FROM jwf_workitem a WHERE a.State = '528' AND ( a.BusinessData4 != 'FAIL' OR a.BusinessData4 is null ) AND a.UserCode = '_RESERVE_' AND a.Limit IS NOT NULL AND a.Limit <= SYSDATE

SELECT COUNT(1) AS "CNT" FROM JWF_PROCESS P INNER JOIN JWF_WORKITEM W ON P.PROCESSID = W.PROCESSID INNER JOIN JWF_PERFORMER PF ON PF.PERFORMERID = W.PERFORMERID AND W.TASKID IS NOT NULL AND W.TASKID = #{taskID} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM DUAL WHERE W.DEPUTYID = #{userCode}
UNION ALL
SELECT 'X' FROM DUAL WHERE PF.USERCODE = #{userCode} AND PF.ACTUALKIND = 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 'X' FROM DUAL WHERE PF.USERCODE = #{unitCode} AND PF.ACTUALKIND = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'X' FROM JWF_JOBFUNCTION JF JOIN JWF_JOBFUNCTIONMEMBER JFM ON JFM.JOBFUNCTIONID = JF.JOBFUNCTIONID WHERE JFM.USERCODE = #{userCode} AND PF.ACTUALKIND = 2 AND JF.JOBFUNCTIONCODE = PF.USERCODE )

SELECT B.FormInstID , B.ProcessID , A.InitiatorID , B.FormID , C.FormPrefix , C.FormName , C.FormSubject , C.IsSecureDoc , C.IsFile , B.DocNo , C.Reserved2 FROM jwf_process A INNER JOIN jwf_forminstance B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN jwf_processdescription C ON B.FormInstID = C.FormInstID WHERE B.FormInstID = #{fiid} group by B.FormInstID, B.ProcessID, A.InitiatorID, B.FormID, C.FormPrefix, C.FormName, C.FormSubject, C.IsSecureDoc, C.IsFile, B.DocNo, C.Reserved2
